title: Calories in KFC Pot Pie
meta_description: Discover calories in pot pie KFC, including full nutrition breakdown like fat, carbs, protein, sodium, and serving tweaks for your meal planning.
assumptions: Standard KFC Chicken Pot Pie (single serving, ~400g); includes flaky crust, chicken, vegetables, creamy sauce; values from official KFC data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and preparation; check KFC app or packaging for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One KFC Chicken Pot Pie has about 720 kcal, with 30g protein and high sodium.

label_note: Values align with Nutrition Facts panel for straightforward comparison.

tweaks.label: Remove top crust (half the calories from crust)
Add side of mashed potatoes (1 serving)

faqs.q: How many calories in one KFC pot pie?
What is the protein content in pot pie KFC?
faqs.a: About 30g of protein from chicken and sauce.

faqs.q: Is KFC pot pie high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1980mg per pot pieâ€”nearly a full day's intake.

faqs.q: How many carbs in calories in pot pie KFC?
faqs.a: Roughly 60g carbs, mostly from the crust and veggies.

faqs.q: Does KFC pot pie have trans fats?
faqs.a: A small amount, about 0.5g, from the crust shortening.
